main

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Maze

  • class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Maze. This class can generate a maze entirely from a ".maze" file. It is possible to determine the number of tiles in the maze, where are the different pills, etc.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Benoît Martel, Yoann Le Dréan
